changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Add CONFIRMED status to order_processing_status check constraint
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE tb_orders DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS tb_orders_order_processing_status_check;

ALTER TABLE tb_orders ADD CONSTRAINT tb_orders_order_processing_status_check CHECK (order_processing_status IN ('PENDING', 'PROCESSING', 'CONFIRMED', 'SELF_DELIVERY', 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'CANCEL'));

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE tb_orders DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS tb_orders_order_processing_status_check;
ALTER TABLE tb_orders ADD CONSTRAINT tb_orders_order_processing_status_check CHECK (order_processing_status IN ('PENDING', 'PROCESSING', 'SELF_DELIVERY', 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'CANCEL'));
